availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Murry (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Morgana Ward Murry in Johnson County on July 6, 1846. Father of Marion Murry, Albert Murry. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 115B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 154.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #001912950, p. 131 of 239 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
